name: 550 Arlov
description: unique bullet for Vitrovski V-85 sniper rifle.

name: 550 Arlov Incendiary
description: Incendiary variant of 550 Arlov, this one has red tip that explode and burning target on hit.

name: 550 Arlov AP
description: Variant of 550 Arlov that uses reinforced material to increase penetration ability at cost of damage reduction.

name: 550 Arlov Explosive
description: Variant of 550 Arlov that uses explosive tip, a bit overkill for killing zombies but enough to give damage to hard targets.
